change.changenote: Section 1 BEFORE amended by 2012-6-5, effective March 29, 2012 (Royal Assent).

section.marginalnote: Fraudulent conveyance to avoid debt or duty of others
section.sectiontext: If made to delay, hinder or defraud creditors and others of their just and lawful remedies

paragraph.paragraphtext: a disposition of property, by writing or otherwise,

section.secsandwich: is void and of no effect against a person or the person's assignee or personal representative whose rights and obligations by collusion, guile, malice or fraud are or might be disturbed, hindered, delayed or defrauded, despite a pretence or other matter to the contrary.
